name: AIscape (sofmits)
description:
This is a prototype of an escape videogame, made for Play and Ludic Interaction 2022-2023 course of the MSc Interaction Design of Malmo University.

students and dev team:
Ecenur Bacaksızlar 
Sofia Mitsigkola 
Maida Sijaric 
Sarah Skavron 

3d models from:

turbosquid.com

3dsky.org

cgtrader.com
